tag_list: information-technology, consulting, alignment, engagement, banking, healthcare, education
overview:
Jeff is a speaker, technology expert and community service advocate. He invested the first 20 years of his career as a management consultant and software engineer for Fortune 500 companies.

Areas of expertise and interest to Jeff:

  • Banking systems
  • Food systems & sustainability
  • Healthcare systems
  • Educational systems and best practices
  • Alternative energy and its evolution

Jeff is a sailing enthusiast, a Rotarian and a longstanding member of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers. He serves on the boards of directors of the Fox Valley Sailing School and the Neenah Rotary Club. He is a member of the Fox Cities Chamber of Commerce, serving on their Small Business Committee, and serves on the New North Small Business and Entrepreneurship Committee.
